idea-plugin.name: VRED-Py
idea-plugin.description:
This plugin adds support for VRED Python API auto completion and documentation.

Features:

  • Autocomplete for VRED API v1 and v2
  • Support for VRED 2021
Usage:
  • This plugin adds the entry 'VRED-Py' to the main menu.
  • Press 'VRED-Py/Add VRED API Modules to Project' to add the VRED Python API modules to your project path.
  • Restart PyCharm to see auto completion.

This plugin is still under development and marked as 'alpha'. If you have any issues please let the developer know! Email me under: chr33z@gmail.com
